title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2015 - New York City, NY, USA
description:
8th Light and the Flatiron School are honored to host a 2015 Global Day of Code Retreat in the Big Apple. 
Please join us for a full day of hands-on coding exercises to improve your craft. 
Just bring your computer and a willingness to stretch your brain. Snacks and Lunch will be provided. 
Space will be limited to 30 people. Please keep on eye on @8thlightinc and @flatironschool for RSVP details.

Registration is now open. Please RSVP atÂ https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/global-day-of-coderetreat-2015-new-y... (https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/global-day-of-coderetreat-2015-new-york-hosted-by-flatiron-school-and-8th-light-tickets-19249384427)
